title: Sew Steady Extension Table, Black
features: Fits black singer Featherweight 221 Model ONLY
description: Inspired by the sewing machine that never goes out of style, our Classic Featherweight Table is made exclusively for the Black and Gold Singer Featherweight 221. Black acrylic is printed with gold details, including a 16" ruler on the front edge. This 17-3/4" x 22-1/2" Table also comes with our Sew Steady Acrylic Shine. Note: THESE ARE MADE TO ORDER FOR THEIR SPECIFIC SEWING MACHINE
